name: Omnis Mundi
overview: Omnis Mundi Invest AG was created by entrepreneurs for entrepreneurs. Their aim is to turn promising ideas and concepts into successful companies. They do not only invest money in ventures - they partner with them. They partner, because they know that it takes more than financial support to grow young and ambitious companies. Therefore they provide additional know-how, expertise, and valuable access to their professional network. Via OmnisMundi Services they render essential facilities such as go-to market strategies, market analysis and business planning and financial planning.

funding_round.source_description: Kublax launches its financial profiling engine for recession-hit Brits
